game.name: Striga
game.categories: Single-player, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Striga is a fast-paced Slavic-inspired isometric roguelite hack-and-slash game where you hunt witches and hags, carve through waves of twisted minions, disrupt dark rituals and absorb their essence and hexes for power. Every kill makes you stronger, every death wiser.
